title: Scaredy Crow
description: Two crows decide to rest for the night in the cornfield. Students learn about cause-and-effect relationships from the crows' reactions when the scarecrow begins to move. The text features supporting illustrations and character dialogue.
reviewWords: blowing, corn, farmer, moved, night, scare, scarecrow, tractor, wind
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause and effect
awareness: Segment Onset and Rime                : Segment onset and rime
grammar: Quotation Marks                : Recognize quotation marks at the beginning and end of dialogue
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary
